text: Vengeance Falls is the sixth album by the metalcore band Trivium. It was released on October 9, 2013 in Japan. It was released on October 14 in the United Kingdom. It was released on October 15 in the United States via Roadrunner Records. It peaked at #15 on the US Billboard 200 chart. ==Track listing== ==Band Members== * Matt Heafy - guitars, lead vocals * Corey Beaulieu - guitars * Paolo Gregoletto - bass guitar * Nick Augusto - drums, percussion ==References== Category:2013 albums Category:Roadrunner Records albums
title: Vengeance Falls
